titleStmt.title: Archidamus, or, The councell of warre Being 2000. yeares old, and written by Isocrates the couragious orator, translated by a Tho: Barnes.
Archidamus. English
titleStmt.author: Isocrates.
Barnes, Thomas, Minister of St. Margaret's, New Fish Street, London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones for Nicholas Bourne, and are to be sold at his shop at the south entrie of the Royall Exchange,
